moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nf3 e6 3. g3 Nf6 4. Bh3: Sorry for skipping  the entire early game, but honestly, i find them to be really boring. Anyways, daniel plays h3 instead of standard g2. Not quite sure, could be his playstyle.
moves.4... Bb4+: This is MY playstyle. Yes, it may be a stupid one, but really, i'm just going for some lucky break everytime. If opponent blocks with knight or bishop, it gives me the initiative.
moves.5... Bd6: So i fallback to this semi-precarious position, not doing much, but then, i'm just really going for king-side castle.
moves.7... e5: And yes, i did it. What could this mean? it means that i am a crazy bastard. Before you comment on the move's stupidity, please consider all other alternates.
moves.8. dxe5: And he TAKES MY PAWN. Plan A is already foiled, so i go for plan B
moves.9. exf6: ARGH. He would be smart enough to take the knight.
moves.9... Qxf6: I was forced. If you doubt my statemennt, check it.
moves.10. Rd1: He moves his rook. And so here we are, 10 moves into the game, pawn structure is already broken, our pieces still underdeveloped, both our king in quite a dangerous position.
moves.11. c4: But he wants to. So i have to come up with something, and it has to be fast.
moves.11... Na6: If you guessed on me making this move, you should either visit a mental hospital, or you are a witch! or i'm actually good.(somewhat unlikely)
moves.12... O-O-O: yes, i do the dreaded queen-side castle.
moves.14. Qc2: He retreats to the safety of not being in line of fire.
moves.15. Qxd1: Another recap here, 15 moves into the game, both of our kings in a dangerous position, white still heavily underdeveloped, white pawn right in my doorstep. I really should take the pawn, shouldn't I?
moves.15... Bf4: Nope, too far away. Might as well do something productive.
moves.16. Bxf4: In case you didn't notice, tht was a joke.
moves.16... Qxf4: So here, i have a mate threat, he has a pawn right in my face, and his rook is still stuck.
moves.17. cxb7+: ARGH. That pawn shall live no further!
moves.18. Qb3: ........... WUT??!?!?!?! *NOTE* Checkmate sequence: a) 18. ... Qc1+ 19. Qd1 Qxd1+ 20. N e1 Qxe1#  b) 18. ... Qg4+ 19. Kh1 Qg2#
moves.18... Qg4+: YAY I WIN      Umm this game is still ongoing, (technically) but really... i won. but i give daniel credit, it's been a while i played chesss, and he made this game quite enjoyable. Please criticize our moves in comments!
